Package fr.multimc.api.spigot.tools.gui.interfaces

Interface IGuiBuilder

public interface IGuiBuilder
Custom GuiBuilder. Make the GUI management easier for you.
Since:
03/10/2022

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    fill(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
    Populate the inventory: - Create animations; - Repeat some stuff; - Decorate the GUI.
    boolean
    interact(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, int slot, org.bukkit.event.inventory.ClickType click)
    Manage the GUI interaction: - Filter actions; - Close inventory if needed; - Cancel the event if needed; - Open sub GUIs.
    int
    size()
    The size is represented by the number of slots (multiples of 9).
    String
    title()
    This title will be colored dynamically before the opening of the GUI.

  • Method Details

    • title

      @Nonnull String title()
      This title will be colored dynamically before the opening of the GUI.
      Returns:
      Inventory's title

    • size

      int size()
      The size is represented by the number of slots (multiples of 9).
      Returns:
      Inventory's size.

    • interact

      boolean interact(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nonnull org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, @Nonnull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, int slot, @Nonnull org.bukkit.event.inventory.ClickType click)
      Manage the GUI interaction: - Filter actions; - Close inventory if needed; - Cancel the event if needed; - Open sub GUIs.
      Parameters:
      player - Inventory owner.
      inventory - Inventory instance.
      item - Clicked item.
      slot - Clicked slot.
      click - Click type.
      Returns:
      Should the event be cancelled.
